name: St. Barts Hair and Body Mist
categories: Fragrance, Women, Body Mist & Hair Mist
about: What it is:u00a0Get transported all the OUAI to the beaches of St. Barts with this luxurious, tropical-scented hair and body mist with notes of dragon fruit, orange blossom, tuberose, and musk.Fragrance Family:u00a0Fresh.Scent Type:u00a0Fresh Solar.Key Notes:u00a0Dragon Fruit, Orange Blossom, MuskFragrance Description: This scent is not a basic beach. With notes of dragon fruit, orange blossom, tuberose, and musk, a tropical vacay is only a spray a-OUAI..What Else You Need to Know: Get transported all the OUAI to the beaches of St. Barts with this luxurious, tropical-scented hair and body mist to be spritzed from head to toe, with notes of dragon fruit, orange blossom, tuberose, and musk.
ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Alcohol Denat., Polysorbate 20, Fragrance/Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Mist the St. Barts scent all over your hair and body whenever you want to get a-OUAI.

What I love most about it is its lightweight formula, which doesnu2019t weigh my hair down or make it feel sticky. It absorbs quickly, leaving my locks feeling soft and silky. The added shine it gives is a delightful bonus, making my hair look vibrant and healthy. I can easily apply it throughout the day, and it helps to tame any flyaways, giving my hair a polished finish.  Moreover, this hair mist is versatile. I can use it on damp hair before styling or as a refreshing touch-up on dry hair. The blend of nourishing ingredients not only enhances my hairu2019s appearance but also protects it from environmental stressors. Overall, this hair mist has become an essential part of my hair care arsenal, and I canu2019t imagine my routine without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve always been intrigued by Ouai as a brand but had never tried any of their products until now. When I got the chance to try the Hair and Body Mist from the St. Barts collection, I was instantly transported to a tropical paradise with just one spritz. The scent is vibrant and upliftingu2014a true mood booster that evokes the feeling of a luxurious vacation.  While coconut isnu2019t officially listed among the notes, I canu2019t help but detect a warm, subtle hint of it, which adds to the tropical vibe. What makes it stand out for me is the addition of fresh citrusy notes that balance the scent perfectly. Itu2019s not cloyingly sweet; instead, it dances beautifully between different layers of freshness and warmth.  This mist makes you feel effortlessly sexy and confident. Iu2019m not a fan of overly sweet, overpowering scents, and this strikes just the right balance. Itu2019s perfect for those days when you donu2019t feel like wearing a heavy perfume. However, as much as I love the initial burst of fragrance, it doesnu2019t have much staying power. The scent fades quickly and doesnu2019t linger long on the skin.  Overall, this is a great pick for a light, refreshing boost of fragrance, especially for casual, carefree days. Itu2019s a little escape in a bottle, even if just for a short while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who lives for a good scent (and has a nose that never misses), I couldnu2019t wait to try OUAIu2019s St. Barts Hair & Body Mistu2014especially now that it comes in a bigger size! Let me tell you, this mist is everything I imagined and more. One spritz, and I was transported to a sun-drenched beach, with warm breezes and tropical vibes all around me. The scent is a perfect blend of fruity, floral, and musky. The top notes of orange oil and dragon fruit add a vibrant, juicy sweetness, while the orange blossom and tuberose in the heart give it a soft, elegant floral twist. The base of Baltic amber and musk ties everything together with a warm, sensual finish that lingers beautifully on the skin. What sets this mist apart for me is how versatile it is. I love spritzing it in my hair for that subtle u201cdid-someone-just-walk-by-smelling-like-vacation?u201d effect, and it layers perfectly on my skin without being overpowering. Itu2019s light enough for daily wear, but noticeable enough to turn headsu2014and yes, even my husband noticed it the second he walked in the door! He actually stopped and said, u201cWow, whatu2019s that? It smells amazing.u201d If youu2019re someone who craves a luxurious yet effortless scent that makes you feel like youu2019re living your best life on an island, this mist is for you. Plus, the fact that itu2019s designed for both hair and body makes it a perfect travel (or gym bag) companion. My only advice? Get the bigger size while you can. This scent is addictive, and youu2019ll want to douse yourself in it daily. Trust me, St. Barts isnu2019t just a placeu2014itu2019s a vibe, and this mist captures it perfectly.

reviews.review_text: Doesn't last long but the smell is divine! So, I don't mind reapplying. It is small enough to put in a bag, so reapplication is easy. reviews.review_text: This is a favorite of my daughter and I. It smells delicious and lasts a while. It is easy to carry in my purse for on the go re-application. The packaging is very cute and appealing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Will dry-out your hair and bad longevity.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This spray smells really nice, it's great for summer so I wish it lasted longer. I would have to spray this a million times for the sent to even last 10 minutes on my hair & body. I also noticed my hair started getting really dry. That's when I looked at the ingredients and saw denatured alcohol as the second ingredient :/  Waste of money, will dry ur skin/hair and scent doesn't last at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product.  Not only does it smell amazing, it leaves me feeling clean and refreshed. It dries quickly without leaving a film or residue.  I get compliments all of the time telling me I smell great, even on the hottest days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i LOVE they way this smells and i love the application because it is like a fine mist, it doesn't last very long but if you layer it it adds the perfect touch to it all
Doesnu2019t last at all I bought it for a summer hair perfume and I wish i would have bought something else instead the smell is gone in minutes

reviews.review_title: Not my favorite Ouai product unfortunately
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am OBSESSED with Ouai products, so I was expecting more from this product and was a little disappointed after testing it. The fragrance reminds me of a cheap perfume (reminds me of Victoria Secret and Body Works body sprays). It did make my skin and hair a little hydrated, but it didnu2019t last long. I did like that it didnu2019t make my hair oily when spraying it in my hair - the scent does not last long on the hair or the skin. I would not purchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a tropical summery scent, but most that I've tried end up leaning too powdery on me once they dry down. This one doesn't though, and I wonder if it's because the most prominent note I'm smelling is pineapple rather than coconut? Either way, this smells like a pina colada and while I certainly get some coconut and some floral, the fruity aspect is the most prominent on my skin and keeps it smelling brighter, less powdery, which is what I wanted. It isn't super strong or long lasting but I do find if I spray my hair and clothes that works the best. Five stars for nailing the exact scent I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is gorgeous.  The lasting power is nothing.  It last like 5 minutes.  I would love to find a long lasting clean fragrance with similar notes to this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This spray fades almost as soon as you put it on. It has absolutely no longevity. It does smell really good, very tropical with a strong citrus note. I honestly wouldn't mind paying for something like this for a $12 price point, but certainly not $28. I would have returned if I lived closer to Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want my money back! Does not last longer than a minute and when I spray I literally have to hold my breath otherwise it'll burn my nose. Wow QUAI why?? Do more work on this before selling because this ain't it.
Doesnu2019t last at all I bought it for a summer hair perfume and I wish i would have bought something else instead the smell is gone in minutes

reviews.review_text: I feel like the reviews are artificially inflated by people receiving free product as usual (Sephora, please sort it out). Itu2019s not a bad smell by any means, but itu2019s not amazing either - itu2019s really bland actually. The notes described in the product description arenu2019t that accurate to me (could differ person to person though).  It doesnu2019t last long at all, far shorter than Iu2019d expect for the price. Iu2019m giving it a 2 as itu2019s not an offensive scent, but the high price is stupid for what this actually is.

reviews.review_title: Perfect Summer Scent if you have a sweet tooth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first fell in love with this fragrance when I tried the shower gel from this brand. It was love at first note. The scent reminds me of a tropical island and a refreshing drink on a hot dayu2014sweet yet summery, never overwhelming. It pleasantly envelops you and lingers on the skin for about an hour, and on clothes for several days.  I secretly hoped they would release a perfume with this scent. The body mist turned out to be even better than the perfume, as itu2019s impossible to overdo itu2014it leaves the faintest trail, disappearing and reappearing subtly. Sometimes I forget Iu2019ve applied it and wonder where the delightful smell is coming from. This mist is a great, non-intrusive choice for summer if you love sweet scents but find perfumes too overpowering in the heat.
